StarterPicker.chooseStarter: Saisho no Pokemon o erande kudasai:

starter.choose: Saisho no Pokemon o erande kudasai:
starter.shinyInfo: Kaku Pokemon ni wa 500-bun'no 1 no kakuritsu de irochigai ga shutsugen shimasu. Un ga yokereba, namae no yoko ni ✨ no emoji ga hyōji saremasu!

login.prompt: Sude ni akaunto o omochi desu ka?

errors.missingFields: Mēruadoresu to pasuwādo wa hissu desu.
errors.passwordTooShort: Pasuwādo wa 8-moji ijōdearu hitsuyō ga arimasu.
errors.noStarter: Saisho no Pokemon o erande kudasai!
errors.server: Erā ga hassei shimashita. Atode mōichido o tameshi kudasai.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Pasuwādo o risetto
ResetPasswordPage.success: Pasuwādo ga seijō ni henkō saremashita!

errors.failed: Pasuwādo no risetto ni shippai shimashita.

signup.prompt: Mada akaunto o omochi de wa arimasen ka?

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Pasuwādo o o wasuredesu ka
ForgotPasswordPage.success: Akaunto ga sonzai suru baai, rinku ga sōshin saremashita.

Metadata.title: Pokekuizu - Anata no Pokemon chishiki o tamesō
Metadata.description: Korekushon to ninshō shisutemu o sonaeta Pokemon kuizu.

Footer.disclaimer: Pokemon・Pokémon wa Nintendō no shōhyō desu.

HomePage.subtitle: Anata no chishiki o tameshi, Pokemon Zukan o kansei sa se, saikō no torēnā ni narou!

quiz.title: Museigen no kuizu
quiz.description: Subete no sedai no Pokemon gēmu ni kansuru shitsumon ni kotaeyou.

collection.title: Korekushon o tsukurou
collection.description: Seikai suru goto ni, atarashī Pokemon o tsukamaeru chansu ga arimasu.

leaderboard.title: Torēnā rankingu
leaderboard.description: Anata no sukoa to korekushon o hoka no pureiyā to hikaku shiyou.

step1.title: Saisho no Pokemon o erabu
step1.description: Muryō de tōroku shite, shinkō jōkyō to korekushon o hozon shimashou.

step2.title: Kuizu o hajimeru
step2.description: Sukinasedai o erande, anata no chishiki o tameshite mimashou.

step3.title: Minna getto da ze!
step3.description: Tadashiku kotaete Pokemon o atsume, Pokemon Zukan o kansei sa semashou.

starters.title: Bōken o hajimeyou!
starters.subtitle: Akaunto o sakusei shite, saisho no Pokemon o atsumemashou... Anata wa kōundeshou ka?
starters.loading: Ōkido hakase ga anata no Pokemon o junbi shite imasu...

Pokedle.title: Dare da?
Pokedle.subtitle: 8-kai no chōsen de nazo no Pokemon o ateyou.

reward.unauthenticated: Roguin matawa akaunto o sakusei shite sukoa o hozon shi, kono Pokemon o tsukamaeru chansu o getto shiyō!
reward.tooManyAttempts: Mitsuketa ne! Demo, Pokemon o tsukamaeru ni wa 4-kai miman de ateru hitsuyō ga arimasu.
reward.alreadyOwned: Sude ni {name} o motteimasu ga, {score} pointo kakutoku!
reward.upgrade: Sugoi! Irochigai no {name} o tsukamaete, {score} pointo kakutoku! Pokemon Zukan ga kōshin saremashita.
reward.error: Pokemon no tsuika-chū ni erā ga hassei shimashita.
